text: Haidar Abdul-Razzaq Hassan (; 9 June 1982 â€“ 5 June 2022) was an Iraqi footballer. He played as a defender. He represented the Iraq national team from 2001 until 2007, making twenty-four appearances. Haidar died on 5 June 2022 from blunt force trauma after being assaulted by unknown people in Baghdad, aged 39. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Deaths from head injury Category:Murdered sportspeople
title: Haidar Abdul-Razzaq
